instruction: Compose a sympathy card for a family whose dog has just passed away
output:
Dear (family name), 

We are so sorry to hear of the passing of your beloved dog. Although our words pale in comparison to the loss you must feel, we want to send our most sincere and heartfelt condolences. Please know that you are in our thoughts and we wish you strength and comfort during this difficult time.

Sincerely, 
(name)
